short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Includes different effects on websites. Warning! Does not work on internal chrome websites!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension has different effects on websites, such as color changing, or word replacers. If you're bored of the same old themes or colors that a websites has, use our extension to change it up! 

(Does not work on internal chrome websites)
